 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבַח‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==soothe, still== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be free from care***, etc., [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>ZA 1 (1886),188</sup>;iv (1889),269, compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pašâ—u***</u></abbr>, ***grow calm***, so [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES9</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex</sup>.); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁבְּחֶ֑נָּה‎</span> [[Prov.29.11|Prov 29:11]]***he stilleth it***, i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחוֺ‎</span> ***his temper*** ([[BDB#Bi|Bi]] Toy read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָשַׁךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפּוֺ‎</span> ); 2 masculine singular sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁבְּחֵם‎</span> [[Ps.89.10|Ps 89:10]] ***thou stillest them***, i.e. waves (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֵּאוּת הַיָּם‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** (probably Masoretic error for ***Pi\`el*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁבֵּחַ‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁבִּיחַ שְׁאוֺן יַמִּים‎</span> [[Ps.65.8|Ps 65:8]] ***stilling the roar of the seas.*** 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבַח‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==laud, praise== (late Aramaism, compare Aramaic (including Old Aramaic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁבח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Pa\`el ***praise*** see [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 91</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex:</sup> — 

**1.** ***laud, praise***; God.(<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) : ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural sf<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁבְּח֑וּמְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.63.4|Ps 63:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּרַךְ‎</span>); ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁבְּחִי‎</span> [[Ps.147.12|Ps 147:12]], masculine plural sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁבְּהּ֫וּהוּ‎</span> [[Ps.117.1|Ps 117:1]](both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלֵּל‎</span> ); his works, ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁבַּח‎</span> [[Ps.145.4|Ps 145:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִגִּיד‎</span>) 

**2.** ***commend,congratulate***, the dead, ***Infinitiveabsolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁבֵּחַ‎</span> [[Eccl.4.2|Eccl 4:2]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:113gg»§ 113gg</sup>; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare); mirth, as best thing, ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבַּחְתִּי‎</span> [[Eccl.8.15|Eccl 8:15]]. **Hitph.** ***boast*** of (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>): ***Infinitiveconstruct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁתַּבֵּחַ‎</span> [[Ps.106.47|Ps 106:47]]=[[1Chr.16.35|1Chr 16:35]], [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐγ</span>) <span class="bdbLangGreek">καυχᾶσθαι ἐν</span> 



 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁבַח‎</span>] **verb Pa\`el** ==laud, praise== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac; see Biblical Hebrew II. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁבח‎</span> (Aramaism)); — ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁבַּ֑חְךְָ‎</span> [[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]], 1 singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁבְּחֵת‎</span> [[Dan.4.31|Dan 4:31]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁבַּ֫חוּ‎</span> [[Dan.5.4|Dan 5:4]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְשַׁבַּח‎</span> [[Dan.2.23|Dan 2:23]]; [[Dan.4.34|Dan 4:34]] — ***paise***, with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> dei [[Dan.2.23|Dan 2:23]]; [[Dan.4.31|Dan 4:31]]; [[Dan.4.34|Dan 4:34]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> of idols [[Dan.5.4|Dan 5:4]]; [[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]].
